patthana7.22:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:1.1_1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:1.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:1.1_3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:1.1_4: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:1.1_5: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_3: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_4: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_5: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:3.1_0: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:3.1_1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:3.1_2: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
patthana7.22:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
patthana7.22:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana7.22:6.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
patthana7.22:7.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
